riddle: I hitch a ride on the dog, destroy your vacuum, and end up in your bedsheets. You can't win. What am I?
I invade your car, destroy your hardwood floors, and crunch between your teeth when you try to eat outside.
I scream at sunrise, steal your overpriced lunch, and paint your windshield white the second you wash it.
I colonize your hull, kill your gas mileage, and force you to scrape until your shoulders burn.
I am invisible, I laugh at your expensive porch screens, and I eat you alive the moment the wind dies.
see ums  I slam your car door on your shin, steal your hat, and throw your patio furniture into the canal. What am I?
I smell like mildew, squeeze you until you're breathless, and turn bathroom breaks into a logistical nightmare.
I scream like a chainsaw, disregard wake zones, buzz your bulkhead, and ruin your fishing spot every weekend.
I lurk in the sound, strangle your propeller, and force you to go swimming with a knife. What am I?
I swell your front door shut, turn your leather shoes green, and ensure your towel never truly dries.
I ignore your spray, bite a chunk out of your leg, and swarm the second the breeze stops. Who am I?
I hide in the shallows, wait for your foot, and spike your ankle if you forget to shuffle.
I hide in the grass, shank your bare foot, and force you to carry your limping dog home.
